Writing a review after almost 2 weeks of usage. Bought this phone after almost 3 months of research. I am really happy with this phone, as it has everything in it at a good price. Design, display, camera and performance is as per my expectation. Battery back is good. I don't play games much so I get almost full day backup in one single charge. Speakers are loud enough. Amoled display is very bright and beautiful to watch any content on it.
